KITE 20.09
  • Reference

    KITE — Kiel Institute Trade Policy Evaluation

    Compute counterfactual scenarios for trade policy.

    Installing KITE

    To install this package, download the current beta version and install using

    install.packages("~/path/to/KITE_20.09.tar.gz", repos = NULL, type = "source")

    or the current release version

    install.packages("KITE", repos = "http://repo.julianhinz.org/cran")

    Usage

    Update equilibrium

    update_equilibrium() lets you update the equilibrium given the new tariffs.

    Development roadmap

    Immediately

    • Clean-up and document initial conditions pre-processing script (GTAP 10).
    • Update current tariff scheme (baseline/ benchmark)
    • Post-processing: automated pdf-export of the most relevant results after each run.
    • Export-tax integration
    • include non tariff barriers

    Medium-term (till December)

    • Regional dis-aggregation of the model results via regional value-added shares.
    • Function to generate tariff / trade war scenarios (from HS6 to GTAP sectors)

    Long-term (as from January 2021)

    • Extension: land as a production factor
    • Extension: different labor categories
    • Exentsion: constraints on labor mobility (long vs. short run effects)
    • Extension: CO2 price as input cost (Joschka?) and / or on shipping costs (Anna / Vincent?)
    • WIOD/EORA initial conditions
    • Regional dis-aggregation integrated into the model via regional I/O-tables.
